page.title: 09Transport
page.content:
Transport in this area is{extremely {difficult.} There is only one regular bus service into{Totnes,}and only two buses a day. Recently some people in the village have started a community bus service which is run by volunteers. It is proving to be quite popular.
There are no bus services to the out-lying villages and farms at all. Most people own a car. Those that don't live at their place of work usually drive to work.
The nearest railway station is at Totnes which is on the main Plymouth to Exeter line. The trains run quite frequently.
